Herbal magic is a powerful method of inviting protection, love, health, and wealth into your life. Perfect for fresh and seasoned herbalists alike, Herb Magic is your easy-to-digest guide to magical herbalism, introducing you to the spiritual side of herbs and how to use them in spells and rituals for spiritual power and wellness. Access the witchcraft within you with: - The principles of herbalism—Dive into a reader-friendly overview of this old-world spiritual belief system, including advice on the best times to practice, building an altar, and setting intentions. - The healing power of plants—Explore beautiful, illustrated profiles on 40 different herbs that show you the magical properties of each and how to unlock them. - 75 Spells and rituals—Embrace the magic every day with spells and rituals for protection, love, healing, wealth, and even divination—plus a handy herb glossary. Empower yourself and enrich your life with the magic of herbalism.
